questions_1.question: What is the compressor discharge pressure?
Options: Pressure of the gas as it exits stage 14 of the compressor.
Pressure of the gas as it enters stage 14 of the compressor.
Pressure of the gas as it enters stage 10 of the compressor.
Pressure of the gas as it exits stage 1 of the compressor.
